name: Range
description: Represents a contiguous area in a document.

properties.name: font
properties.description: Gets the text format of the range. Use this to get and set font name, size, color, and other properties.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Gets or sets the style used for the range. This is the name of the pre-installed or custom style.

properties.name: paragraphs
properties.description: Gets the collection of paragraph objects in the range.

properties.name: contentControls
properties.description: Gets the collection of content control objects in the range.

properties.name: parentContentControl
properties.description: Gets the content control that contains the range. Returns null if there isn't a parent content control.

properties.name: inlinePictures
properties.description: Gets the collection of inline picture objects in the range.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Gets the text of the range.

properties.name: isEmpty
properties.description: Checks whether the range length is zero.

properties.name: hyperlink
properties.description: Gets the first hyperlink in the range, or sets a hyperlink on the range. Existing hyperlinks in this range are deleted when you set a new hyperlink.

properties.name: parentBody
properties.description: Gets the parent body of the range.

properties.name: lists
properties.description: Gets the collection of list objects in the range.

properties.name: tables
properties.description: Gets the collection of table objects in the range.

properties.name: parentTableCell
properties.description: Gets the table cell that contains the range. Returns null if it is not contained in a table cell.

properties.name: parentTable
properties.description: Gets the table that contains the range. Returns null if it is not contained in a table.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the contents of the range object. The user can perform the undo operation on the cleared content.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the range and its content from the document.

methods.name: insertContentControl
methods.description: Wraps the range object with a rich text content control.

methods.name: insertText
methods.description: Inserts text at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Required. Text to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertHtml
methods.description: Inserts HTML at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: Required. The HTML to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertOoxml
methods.description: Inserts OOXML at the specified location.  The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: ooxml
parameters.description: Required. The OOXML to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertFileFromBase64
methods.description: Inserts a document at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: base64File
parameters.description: Required. The base64 encoded content of a .docx file.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertParagraph
methods.description: Inserts a paragraph at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: paragraphText
parameters.description: Required. The paragraph text to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertBreak
methods.description: Inserts a break at the specified location in the main document. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: breakType
parameters.description: Required. The break type to add.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertInlinePictureFromBase64
methods.description: Inserts a picture at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: base64EncodedImage
parameters.description: Required. The base64 encoded image to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects and navigates the Word UI to the range.

parameters.name: selectionMode
parameters.description: Optional. The selection mode can be 'Select', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Select' is the default.

methods.name: getHtml
methods.description: Gets the HTML representation of the range object.

methods.name: getOoxml
methods.description: Gets the OOXML representation of the range object.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search with the specified searchOptions on the scope of the range object. The search results are a collection of range objects.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Required. The search text.

parameters.name: searchOptions
parameters.description: Optional. Options for the search.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Clones the range, or gets the starting or ending point of the range as a new range.

parameters.name: rangeLocation
parameters.description: Optional. The range location can be 'Whole', 'Start' or 'End'.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the range into child ranges by using delimiters.
methods.signature: split(delimiters: string[], multiParagraphs: bool, trimDelimiters: bool, trimSpacing: bool)

parameters.name: delimiters
parameters.description: Required. The delimiters as an array of strings.

parameters.name: multiParagraphs
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether a returned child range can cover multiple paragraphs. Default is false which indicates that the paragraph boundaries are also used as delimiters.

parameters.name: trimDelimiters
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether to trim delimiters from the ranges in the range collection. Default is false which indicates that the delimiters are included in the ranges returned in the range collection.

parameters.name: trimSpacing
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether to trim spacing characters (spaces, tabs, column breaks and paragraph end marks) from the start and end of the ranges returned in the range collection. Default is false which indicates that spacing characters at the start and end of the ranges are included in the range collection.

methods.name: compareLocationWith
methods.description: Compares this range's location with another range's location.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Required. The range to compare with this range.

methods.name: expandTo
methods.description: Expands the range in either direction to cover another range.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Required. Another range.

methods.name: intersectWith
methods.description: Shrinks the range to the intersection of the range with another range.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Required. Another range.

methods.name: getNextTextRange
methods.description: Gets the next text range by using punctuation marks andor space character.

parameters.name: punctuationMarks
parameters.description: Required. The punctuation marks and/or space character as an array of strings.

parameters.name: trimSpacing
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether to trim spacing characters (spaces, tabs, column breaks and paragraph end marks) from the start and end of the returned range. Default is false which indicates that spacing characters at the start and end of the range are included.

methods.name: getHyperlinkRanges
methods.description: Gets hyperlink child ranges within the range.

methods.name: insertTable
methods.description: Inserts a table with the specified number of rows and columns. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.
methods.signature: insertTable(rowCount: number, columnCount: number, insertLocation: string, values: string[][])

parameters.name: rowCount
parameters.description: Required. The number of rows in the table.

parameters.name: columnCount
parameters.description: Required. The number of columns in the table.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Optional 2D array. Cells are filled if the corresponding strings are specified in the array.

methods.name: getTextRanges
methods.description: Gets the text child ranges in the range by using punctuation marks andor space character.

parameters.name: punctuationMarks
parameters.description: Required. The punctuation marks and/or space character as an array of strings.

parameters.name: trimSpacing
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether to trim spacing characters (spaces, tabs, column breaks and paragraph end marks) from the start and end of the ranges returned in the range collection. Default is false which indicates that spacing characters at the start and end of the ranges are included in the range collection.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
